select (select (select ifnull(count(1),0) from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id=c.user_id) + (select ifnull(count(1),0) from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id in (select user_id from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id=c.user_id))) team_member_count, (select count(1) from tcrm_investor where cfplanner=c.user_id) customer_count, t.mobile as parent_mobile, t.user_name as parent_name, u.user_name,c.* from tcrm_cfplanner c left join tcrm_user_info u on c.user_id=u.user_id left join tcrm_user_info t on t.user_id=c.parent_id
1=1
and c.mobile = #{query.nameOrmobile} or u.user_name =#{query.nameOrmobile}
and DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order BY c.id

SELECT a.bank_card,a.bank_name,a.id_card, a.user_name, t.mobile as parent_mobile, t.user_name as parent_name, c.* from tcrm_cfplanner c LEFT JOIN tac_account_bind a on c.user_id=a.user_id left join tcrm_user_info t on t.user_id=c.parent_id where c.mobile=#{mobile}

SELECT ms.user_id as `number`, ms.mobile as mobile, ms.user_name as `name`, ms.level, ms.create_time as createTime, t2.fee_amount as feeAmount, t3.total_count as totalNums, t3.total_invest as totalAmount FROM ( SELECT s.user_id,s.mobile,u.user_name,'v1' as level,s.parent_id,s.create_time , s.user_id tttt FROM tcrm_cfplanner s LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info u on u.user_id=s.user_id WHERE s.parent_id =#{query.userId} UNION ALL SELECT t.user_id,t.mobile,u.user_name,'v2',t.parent_id,t.create_time, t.parent_id tttt FROM tcrm_cfplanner t LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info u on u.user_id=t.user_id WHERE t.parent_id IN (SELECT a.user_id FROM tcrm_cfplanner a WHERE a.parent_id =#{query.userId}) ORDER BY tttt, level ) ms LEFT JOIN (SELECT origin_cfplanner_id, IFNULL(sum(fee_amount),0) as fee_amount from tcim_feedetail where 1=1 and fee_type=1002 and profit_cfplanner_id=#{query.userId} GROUP BY origin_cfplanner_id ) t2 on t2.origin_cfplanner_id=ms.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(sum(r.invest_amt),0) total_invest , IFNULL(count(r.id),0) total_count,i.cfplanner from tcim_product_invest_record r LEFT JOIN tcrm_investor i on r.user_id=i.user_id LEFT JOIN tcrm_cfplanner c on c.user_id=i.cfplanner where c.parent_id=#{query.userId} or c.parent_id in (SELECT user_id from tcrm_cfplanner where parent_id=#{query.userId} ) GROUP BY i.cfplanner ) t3 on t3.cfplanner=ms.user_id WHERE 1=1 AND (ms.mobile =#{query.searchText} OR ms.user_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{query.searchText}),'%')) ORDER BY null

SELECT u.user_name as customerName, a.mobile as customerMobile, a.create_time as createTime, IFNULL(b.investmentTotalAmount, 0) AS totalAmount, IFNULL(b.investmentCount, 0) AS totalNums, IFNULL(c.nowInvestmentAmount, 0) AS curAmount, IFNULL(c.nowInvestmentCount, 0) AS curNums, IFNULL(b.tfee, 0) AS feeAmount, IF(a.is_free_customer=0,'邀请','自由客户')AS orgName, ac.id_card as idCard FROM tcrm_investor a LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info u on u.user_id=a.user_id LEFT JOIN tac_account_bind ac on ac.user_id=a.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(product_amount) AS investmentTotalAmount, COUNT(investor_id) AS investmentCount, SUM(fee_amount) AS tfee, investor_id FROM tcim_fee WHERE profit_cfplanner_id = #{query.userId} and fee_type='1001' GROUP BY investor_id ORDER BY NULL) b ON a.user_id = b.investor_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(invest_amt) AS nowInvestmentAmount, COUNT(invest_id) AS nowInvestmentCount, invest_id FROM tcim_product_invest_record a left join tcrm_investor b on a.user_id=b.user_id WHERE b.cfplanner = #{query.userId} AND a.`status`=2 GROUP BY invest_id ORDER BY NULL) c ON c.invest_id = b.investor_id
a.cfplanner =#{query.userId}
AND (u.user_name = #{query.searchText} OR a.mobile = #{query.searchText})
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')as date,COUNT(1)as count FROM tcrm_cfplanner
1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND CURDATE()
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT a.*,b.*,c.*,d.* FROM (SELECT COUNT(1)AS curday FROM tcrm_cfplanner WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=CURDATE())a, (SELECT COUNT(1)AS curWeek FROM tcrm_cfplanner WHERE create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND CURDATE())b, (SELECT COUNT(1)AS curmonth FROM tcrm_cfplanner WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m'))c, (SELECT COUNT(1)AS total FROM tcrm_cfplanner )d

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')as date,COUNT(1)as count FROM tcrm_cfplanner
1=1 AND cfp_level!='PROBATION'
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND CURDATE()
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT a.*,b.*,c.*,d.* FROM
(SELECT COUNT(1)AS curday FROM tcrm_cfplanner WHERE 1=1 AND cfp_level!='PROBATION' AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=CURDATE())a,
(SELECT COUNT(1)AS curWeek FROM tcrm_cfplanner WHERE 1=1 AND cfp_level!='PROBATION' AND create_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND CURDATE())b,
(SELECT COUNT(1)AS curmonth FROM tcrm_cfplanner WHERE 1=1 AND cfp_level!='PROBATION' AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m'))c,
(SELECT COUNT(1)AS total FROM tcrm_cfplanner WHERE 1=1 AND cfp_level!='PROBATION')d
